projects.title: Mini-YouTube
projects.desc: Mini-YouTube is a single page application made with JavaScript & ReactJS for easily accessing YouTube on low end devices.

projects.title: Lifestyle Store
projects.desc: A complete E-Commerce store with Authentication & Authorization, Session Management, Cart Handling and more, build with HTML/CSS/Bootstrap for the front-end, PHP as the back-end and MySQL as the data store.

projects.title: Library Management
projects.desc: Desktop app for Library Management with Authentication & Authorization modules, Database integration and more, build with Java.

projects.title: Todo-List
projects.desc: A simple Todo-List made with Angular at it's core.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.desc: My current portfolio built using ReactJS, EmailJS and Semantic UI.

projects.title: Bouncy
projects.desc: Bouncy is a single page application game built with Angular at it's core.
